entry.title: Mission Super Possible!
entry.summary:
Author: lilacswraith

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,104Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 3

Summary: Dick Grayson, young and still learning to navigate the tangles of grief, begins to see the cracks in the façade of ‘fine’ that Bruce maintains. After a lifetime searching for an undertaking that will give him meaning, he has decided to embark on his greatest mission yet: making Bruce Wayne happy. Really, truly, properly happy. He is convinced he is failing— namely because he can’t figure out what “real” happiness looks like on Bruce and goes with the safer answer of… it’s all fake. Enter Superman: Hero, Journalist, Answer to his prayers. And, if his new and revised plan succeeds… his future step-father? … Batman is not in love with Superman. He isn’t, stop looking at him like that! But his 9 year old seems to be under the assumption that they’re dating and Bruce… well Bruce can’t break his heart. Why don’t his parenting books ever cover this crap?! … Clark? Clark is a bit confused, to say the least, because his best friend’s son is calling him papa and his best friend is… playing along? (Did they start dating without him realising? Surely not??) Oh well… There are worse things in the world than Bruce Wayne looking at you like he wants to kiss you. Sigh if only it were real…

I have a plan for most of these tags, but I am writing as we go. So, I am open to suggestions for ships in the Batman universe. As is, there will be two plots told at the same time. entry.title: Superstressed
entry.summary:
Author: Art_Deco_Hitchhiker

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,584Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 211

Summary: Clark Kent tries to keep some secrets. From his parents, from his best friend Lois, from the world. He likes to think that he is doing pretty well, dividing his time between his journalism and his Superman shenanigans. He is normal. Nothing strange or otherworldly about him. But when Clark has to interview billionaire Bruce Wayne for The Daily Planet, his carefully crafted image starts tearing at the seams.
